注释：这是看了vechs的shs和noobcrew的孤岛生存的灵感做
规则：
别作弊
别修改
别用bug
别地图编辑
别用这类的第三方mod或软件！
游戏难度至少easy，推荐hard
版本必须1.0 不然此地图无法玩！ （别说修改 修改啥都能玩）

目标: 
菜鸟:
跳到第二座岛（提示：矿车可以用来短距离传送）
到达第三座岛（提示：为啥要1.0？ 为啥给你那么多ender珍珠？）
打败地牢
得到骨头
回到第二座岛，到达第四座岛
种树
做床
做小的小麦，甘蔗，西瓜和南瓜农场
做碎石生成器
做无限水源
学徒：
做个3层住宅
做个给动物出生的地方
做个刷怪塔（改造第三座岛也行）
做个半自动小麦农场
做个半自动西瓜和南瓜农场
用活塞做个大型碎石生成器
得到铁，红石和钻石
做个鸡蛋农场
做蛋糕
进阶：
做个黑曜石生成器
去地狱
打败第五个blaze地牢
做个药剂座
做个物品升级台/附魔台
升级你的工具和防具
做个刷经验器
做个大大大大的树园
牛叉：
做个全自动甘蔗，西瓜和南瓜农场（bud开关和micromancer的视频也许能帮助）
拿到足够经验 成就一次45+的强化
杀20js猪
杀20enderman
杀20magmacube
至尊:
杀死黑龙！！！！
得到黑龙蛋！

Hints: 
岩浆柱+水柱可以弄成很长的碎石柱子， 你想到岛屿的下面可以用到他。
活塞+方块=闷死怪物陷阱 可以用他让怪物被一击拳头就死
草要足够光+附近有土才会扩散
黑曜石生成器用红石的
你需要用书柜来完成45+强化！


English:
Note: this is an inspiration of Vechs' SuperHostile Series and Noobcrew's Sky Block Survival, all credit goes to Vechs and Noobcrew. 
Noobcrew's SBS: http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/600254-surv-skyblock/
Vechs' SPH series: http://www.minecraftforum.net/to ... e-series-%E2%98%A0/
Well, i made a surMAP~ the beginning might be hard (i'll make harder versions). There're 5 islands, 3 supply islands and 2 dungeon islands.
This version is Easy. Normal and Hard are still in process, more maps to come :D
Minecraft 1.0 is required
Rules:
DON'T CHEAT
DON'T HACK
DON'T USE ANY 3 PARTY MODS THAT'LL MAKE GAMEPLAY BORING
JUST DON'T
Game difficulty at least easy, hard is recommended

Achievements: 
Newbie:
Make the jump to 2nd island (Hint: Minecarts can be use as short-distant teleporters) 
Make it to the 3rd dungeon island (Hint: Why this map requires 1.0? In other words why did i give you lots of Enderpearls?)
Beat the dungeon
Get some bones 
Make your way back to the 2nd island and manage it to the further 4th island
Plant a tree :D
Craft a bed :D
Make a small wheat, sugar cane, pumpkin and melon farm
Make a cobblestone generator
Make an infinite water spring
Apprentice:
Build a house with 3 stories
Make an area for animal spawn
Make a mobtower (or use the 3rd island dungeon as a mob grinder)
Build a semi-auto wheat farm (self-harvesting)
Build a semi-auto melon and pumpkin farm
Build a large cobblestone generator powered by pistons
Obtain iron, diamond and redstone
Make an eggfarm
Craft a cake :p
Expert:
Make an obsidian generator
Go to the nether
Beat the 5th blaze dungeon
Make a brewing stand 
Make an enchantment table
enchant your tools and armor
Make an XP-farm 
Giant treeeeeee farm!
Pro:
Make a fully automatic sugar cane, melon and pumpkin farm (BUDFTW, micromancer has good vids :D)
Get enough xp, make a 45lv+ enchantment
Kill 20 endermen
Kill 20 zombie-pigmen
Kill 20 magmacubes
Insane:
KILL THE ENDERDRAGON!
Obtain a dragon egg

Hints: 
lava pillar covered by water will make a giant pillar of cobbles, this may be useful when you want to go under an island (ect, blazefarm)
BUD=block update detector
Pistons+blocks+delay circuit = sufforcation trap, use it in your xp farm :D
Grass requires enough light and nearby dirt to spreadout
Obsidian generator uses redstone
You need bookshelves in order to achieve '45lv+ enchantment'
